reporter_caption.center: STATE v. EISSLER, 12 Neb. App. lxiv (2004)

opinion.opinion_text: Motions of appellee for summary affirmance sustained; judgments affirmed. See, State v. Decker, 261 Neb. 382, 622 N.W.2d 903 (2001);State v. Dodson, 250 Neb. 584, 550 N.W.2d 347 (1996); State v. Irish,223 Neb. 814, 394 N.W.2d 879 (1986). See, also, State v. Tweedy,209 Neb. 649, 309 N.W.2d 94 (1981).
